metadata.title: CVE-2022-32222 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: A cryptographic vulnerability exists on Node.js on linux in versions of 18.x prior to 18.40.0 which allowed a default path for openssl.cnf that might be accessible under some circumstances to a non-admin user instead of /etc/ssl as was the case in versions prior to the upgrade to OpenSSL 3.

criterions.comment: nodejs package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
